channel.title: Mac problems. Rep++ if applicable
channel.description:
Hey,
I just decided to have a little look on a private server via webclient. It downloaded the cache, and then came up with that black screen saying "Sorry, an error has occurred whilst running runescape, please try one of the following..."
I then downloaded the client and had the same problem.
Any suggestions?
Thanks
Eddy

item.title: Mac problems. Rep++ if applicable
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Okay thanks, that makes sence. Is it just worth running it in windows rather than on my macOS?

Files like “nullmainfilecache.dat” were downloaded to the folder that the .jar file is in…? Are there more cache’s that are downloaded?

Read full topic

item.title: Mac problems. Rep++ if applicable
item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

Its because the files save to the C:/ they need to be saved to the default mac area instead

Read full topic
